G

Game - Class in model
Game handles game play, and contains the players and the communal pile of cards.
Game(ArrayList<String>, int) - Constructor for class model.Game
Game is constructed with a list of player names, and the number of decks to be used.
GameException - Exception in model
Exceptions from game play.
GameException(String) - Constructor for exception model.GameException
 
GameView - Class in view
Game view manages the views for the game scene.
GameView(int) - Constructor for class view.GameView
Initialises the stage elements.
GameViewController - Class in controller
Controls the view objects and listeners for game play.
GameViewController(int[]) - Constructor for class controller.GameViewController
Game View Controller is instantiated with inputs generated by the menu controller, indicating number of players and decks.
getButtonScenePair() - Method in class view.MenuView
This hashmap contains buttons as keys, and their corresponding subscene as values.
getChosenDeck() - Method in class view.StartSubScene
Returns the numerical value of the chosen check box for the player picker.
getChosenPlayers() - Method in class view.StartSubScene
Returns the numerical value of the chosen check box for the deck picker.
getDeck() - Method in class model.Player
Returns the player's personal deck
getDeckBoxes() - Method in class view.StartSubScene
Returns the SnapCheckBox objects necessary for selecting the number of decks.
getDisplay() - Method in class view.PlayerView
Returns current state of player display, without potential update.
getEndScene() - Method in class view.GameView
Get the ending scene.
getExitButton() - Method in class view.EndSubScene
 
getExitButton() - Method in class view.MenuView
Returns the exit button.
getFromTextFile(String) - Method in class view.SnapSubScene
Given a path, tries to collect text from said path and return it as a String.
getGameOver() - Method in class model.Game
Returns true if the game is over, else false.
getGameScene() - Method in class view.GameView
Get the game scene
getHasLost() - Method in class model.Player
Returns true if the player has lost and is out of the game.
getHidden() - Method in class view.InstructionsSubScene
Gameplay should not be able to continue while the game is obscured by the instructions scene.
getId() - Method in class model.Player
Returns the player's Id.
getId() - Method in class view.PlayerView
Returns the player view id, which is identical to the player model id.
getInstructions() - Method in class view.GameView
Get the Instructions scene
getIsChosen() - Method in class view.SnapCheckBox
returns whether the chekBox has been selected or not
getKeyCode() - Method in class view.PlayerView
Returns the keyCode associated with this player id.
getLastCard() - Method in class model.Deck
Returns the second last turned card, if it has been set, or returns null.
getLastCard() - Method in class model.Game
Gets the second last turned card of the communal pile
getMainButton() - Method in class view.EndSubScene
 
getMainStage() - Method in class controller.MenuController
 
getName() - Method in class model.Player
Returns the player name.
getNames(int) - Method in class view.NameDialog
GetNames collects n number of names in String format, and returns them as an Array List.
getNumber() - Method in class view.SnapCheckBox
returns the number value associated with the checkbox
getNumberOfCards() - Method in class model.Deck
 
getPane() - Method in class view.SnapSubScene
Returns this pane cast as an AnchorPane
getPile() - Method in class model.Game
Returns the deck that contains the communal pile of the game.
getPileView(int) - Method in class view.PileView
The number of cards displayed is updated to match the number of cards in the model, and the stack pane is returned.
getPlayButton() - Method in class view.StartSubScene
Returns the play button for launching the game view
getPlayer(int) - Method in class model.Game
Returns the player at index i in the Player list.
getPlayerBoxes() - Method in class view.StartSubScene
Returns the SnapCheckBox objects necessary for selecting the number of players.
getPlayers() - Method in class model.Game
Returns an ArrayList of all Players
getPlayerViewList() - Method in class view.GameView
Get ArrayList of all player views (one per player).
getScoreButton() - Method in class view.MenuView
Returns the score button.
getScoreScene() - Method in class view.MenuView
Returns the scores subscene.
getSnap() - Method in class view.SnapActionView
returns unmodified current snap view
getStartScene() - Method in class view.MenuView
Returns the start subscene.
getTopCard() - Method in class model.Deck
Returns the last turned card, if it has been set, or returns null.
getTopCard() - Method in class model.Game
Gets the last turned card of the communal pile
getTurn() - Method in class model.Game
Returns an int indicating the id of the player whose turn it is.
getTurn() - Method in class view.PlayerView
Returns text view indicating it is this player's turn.
getValue() - Method in class model.Card
Returns integer value of card
getWinner() - Method in class model.Game
Returns the winning player.
